decoupling_requirements.reason: 10-100nF on VCC (pin 8), close to pin. Prevents supply glitches during output transitions.

external_components.reason: 10nF on CTRL (pin 5) to GND if not used for modulation. Prevents noise coupling.

pin_requirements.reason: Control voltage pin (pin 5) should have 10nF to GND if unused. Prevents noise from affecting threshold.

warnings: Output can sink/source 200mA but gets hot - limit to 100mA for reliability
Bipolar 555 draws current spikes during switching - use decoupling
CMOS versions (TLC555, ICM7555) have lower power and higher frequency capability
